TopicTitle: Sporkboy's guide to going to Duna (without docking)

Articles.Content:
Sporkboy's guide to going to Duna (without docking)


This is a beginner-friendly guide to a first landing and return from Duna. It doesn't require any docking, since that's a sticking point for a lot of people.  Written for 1.0.5.

As prerequisites, you'll need to be able to orbit and land on Mun comfortably.

 

Reddit discussion: https://www.reddit.com/r/KerbalSpaceProgram/comments/3tvogb/sporkboys_guide_to_going_to_duna_without_docking/

Edited December 8, 2015 by m_sporkboy
formatting
